summary.content: Paul emailed me today with an invitation to check out his new Web/Design/Music/Apple/etc forum. Granted any new forum is always wanting new visitors, but it’s been cool seeing other webloggers like Paul, Andy Mac, Darice, Sken, and others. This will definitely be a new stop on the internet for me!

content.html:
Paul emailed me today with an invitation to check out his new Web/Design/Music/Apple/etc forum.

Granted any new forum is always wanting new visitors, but it’s been cool seeing other webloggers like Paul, Andy Mac, Darice, Sken, and others.

This will definitely be a new stop on the internet for me!
content.plain:
Paul emailed me today with an invitation to check out his new Web/Design/Music/Apple/etc forum.
Granted any new forum is always wanting new visitors, but it’s been cool seeing other webloggers like Paul, Andy Mac, Darice, Sken, and others.
This will definitely be a new stop on the internet for me!
content.source:
[Paul]({{% wayback "http://www.smithpaul.com" %}}) emailed me today with an invitation to check out his new [Web/Design/Music/Apple/etc forum]({{% wayback "http://www.creativeunknowns.co.uk/forum/" %}}).

Granted any new forum is always wanting new visitors, but it’s been cool seeing other webloggers like [Paul]({{% wayback "http://www.smithpaul.com" %}}), [Andy Mac]({{% wayback "http://branchleft.co.uk/" %}}), [Darice]({{% wayback "http://www.darice.org" %}}), [Sken]({{% wayback "http://www.sken.be" %}}), and others.

This will definitely be a new stop on the internet for me!

prev.title: Re: How I stopped buying CDs and started loving music
